a gift and she liked them

Wowowo these r amazing They are so comfy and flattering I was in between a XS and S and went with the XS and I’m glad I got the XS if you want a tighter fit on the butt size down So cute you need Looks just like lululemon

I ABSOLUTELY love these pants!!! They are such an amazing dupe for the lulu studio dance pant, I have both and I honestly might like the dupes more. They are so comfortable and light weight, they’re perfect for working out or wearing them for a casual fit as well.

I love these pants! They are a great dupe. However, they are not synched at the ankle like the picture. Also, the first time i washed them one of the ends of the string got caught in the dryer and now the string is curly. So tie the strings before washing. They’re a but long. Other than that I love them!

评论概述: great dupe for lulu dance studio jogger
评论详情: I tried on the dance studio joggers from lulu and didnt love how they fit and couldnt justify the price for them so i settled for these instead and im glad that i did!! these fit much better and are comparable quality to lulu for a fraction of the price! I will be buying more in different colors.
I love these pants. I’m 5’2 and they’re pretty long but you can tie the bottom of the leg holes so that helps. I wear them as casual pants and also as scrub pants for work.

Very flattering and fits very well. I am 5’6, 140 lbs and got a small. Fits tight but not comfortable on waist and thighs. Good material. Just like the Lululemon ones. They do make some noise when walking but not bad at all. Overall I Love them, would buy again.

Have the name brand version and love them but didn’t want to spend so much on another pair. I’ve already purchased so many other Crz Yoga items and love them so decided to try these out! I got an XS which is about the same as a size 4.

评论概述: I’d say they’re good not great
评论详情: I bought these since I heard they’re a good lulu dance studio jogger dupe, and tbh, they’re not super far off. They were longer than I anticipated which was ok, but in order to get the “jogger” look you do have to tie the ankle strings yourself, so no elastics with toggles - which I won’t lie, was a bit of a pain but not awful. The material is pretty thin so the wind will go straight through. I’d say they’re a bit tight in the butt snd thighs for me but I am a little curvier so i wasn’t too shocked. They have a nice high rise with a comfortable waist band. Id say it’s worth a buy to see how it works for your body type!

I love these pants! Didn’t love the lulu ones because they were so low waisted and fit me weird but these are perfect! They fit so nice! I’m 5’6 150 lbs with an athletic build and I got a Small, they are a little tighter in the butt so if you want a looser fit i’d go bigger! I have them in every color now and I need them to release more!
I love these! These are not only a lululemon dupe but I would say they’re better. I really like these pants! We need more colors!

评论概述: Little long but really like them otherwise
评论详情: I’m 5’7 and these are definitely a little long on me, even with sneakers. I wish the pant leg adjusters had a stopper on them. I guess I’ll have to tie knot. Other than that I love the material and fit. They are the perfect lulu dupe!
Dupe for Lululemon dancer pants. These pants are super light weight and long. I usually order long for pants but these fit my long legs. The pockets are deep. Very high waisted! Love these pants.

I got these on black Friday and they are my new favs. They are comfortable and flattering..not see-through. I'm a bigger girl and these are pretty flattering. I might buy the other color when they go on sale.
nice pants but super wrinkly after washing.  steaming athletisure isn't something I desire to do.

评论概述: Perfect thin pants for long legs
评论详情: As a taller girl (5' 8") it is difficult to find pants that are long enough, so I was so happy to find these. I don't usually like sweatpants but since these tighten at the bottom, the fitted nature was acceptable for me. They are somewhat thin, but I plan on wearing them to the gym over shorts in the winter. So glad I found these pants.
Very thin, feels like I’m wearing just a sheet of plastic. I like the big pockets though. Also a bit big, I should have bought XS.
Stretched out a full size within a week of wear.

Ordered direct from CRZ.  Very disappointed.  These were not the cheapest pants I could have ordered so I am very disappointed in the quality.  The seams are so puckered the legs will not hang straight. The shipment took a long time to arrive.  By the tracking I would guess they came from China although the return address on the package shows right here in Florida.  The company's return policy leaves me to lose shipping costs back to them and deduct shipping to me IF they accept the return.  What if they don't?  Do I lose my returned items?  What a scam.  These are not as shown.

The product is fine but when I opened these from the packaging, there was no tag and there was some loose change in the pants lol. So they definitely were worn before and just not checked for quality before they were shipped out to me.

I’ve had the well-known brand and these are spot on. Same fit and quality feel.

These are amazing dupe dancer pants. I have the real ones. These look and feel wonderful. I’m athletic build got an S, love them for dance, gym, casual outdoors . Since they are roomy, Will order a second pair and try the XS this time.
Just like the lululemon ones, I wear them at dance and they are very flexible and breathable, I get less hot in them then I do leggings
Very flattering. Perfect fit and super comfortable, will buy more !

I was disappointed by the fit of the Lulu studio dance pants and had to return them. Was pleasantly surprised at how well this fit me and how comfortable they are. I got these in the meantime and they are a great dupe. I’m 5’3 around 153lbs. I think I could have gotten a medium because they are a little baggy in the crotch. light weight but isnt see through

评论概述: Great pants… but they fall a bit short
评论详情: I wanted to love these pants, and as far as the fit, fabric, and comfort- they are great! My only complaint is the length. I wish there was a tall option, as they hit just a couple inches short. So,  great pants, just not the best length or options for those who are 5’7” or above.
I’m 5’5” and the inseam on these was just a couple inches too long. Otherwise I really liked these! A great lululemon dupe with comparable quality.

I love these so much better than the current dance studio pants from lululemon. I had a straight leg 7/8 Length pair years ago that I loved, but the current fit is not the same.  These have a more comfortable rise, and the elasticity/tightness of the waistband correlates better to the hip size of the pants. The lulu’s waistband is really tight for how big they are in the hips. I literally returned my dance studio pants to keep these. if you like that dance studio look but don’t love the Lulu Price or Fit, you need to buy these!
Inseam is way too short. I wish a tall inseam (36”) was offered :(

评论概述: These pants are the PERFECT dupe!
评论详情: I often question these people who claim an item is a “dupe” for a quality brand name item but this is the real deal!  I love my lulu dance studio pants.  They are perfect for hiking, golf, cold weather pickleball, anything athletic.  You can also pair them with a sweater and wear them to work with a low heal.  Love love love them! Recently, I’ve lost some weight. I am 5’4” and now wear a size 8.  I didn’t want to purchase another pair of dance studio pants because, let’s face it, I don’t know how long I will be wearing an 8!  I may go back up to 10.  These factors caused me to consider this item.  I knew if it didn’t fit or if it wasn’t the quality I expected, I could return.  Omg!  These pants are nearly identical!!! The feel, the fit, the waist band, the overall quality is the same for less than half the price! Wear on a hike or wear to dinner! I hope they decide to make more colors!  This purchase has me extremely interested in this brand now! My husband wants to try their version of the ABC pants!  If you love dance studio, don’t hesitate.  BUY THESE PANTS!
How do these not have all 5 star reviews?  These pants are my new favorite! Just buy them you won’t regret it. Similar to dance studio pants but $100 less.
These are soo comfy, pulls off as scrub pants if needed. Looks just like lulu!!! Soo comfy and flattering
Very long and not as expected
Incredible Lulu dupe. Love these. Very breathable, not thick. Super comfy

I got a medium and returned it because they where a little too lose but a small was perfect. I'm 5,4 and 130pounds and they look just like the $130 pants I wanted to buy but didn't want to spend the money on! The quality is great
Perfect for back & forth to DANCE STUDIO
Easy to wear fits true to size and light weight!!
Came on time, runs a little big and wrinkles easily, but when I tried to iron it it MELTED A WHOLE IN THE PANTS😭

these are small!!! I am a thick thigh thick butt queen but these are tighhht. I have a pair of size 10 lulu dance studio pants and those fit me perfect in the thighs alittle loose in the waist. These are opposite. Tight in the waist and also sooooo tight on the thighs but then the calves are pretty loose and long. I have yet to actually wear them because I don’t really like tight on my thighs but I do like that they’re high waisted compared to lulus.
